sourcesContent:
import {combineReducers} from 'redux'
import {persistReducer} from 'redux-persist'//we also import persistReducer in the root reducer
import storage from 'redux-persist/lib/storage'//import this to use the storage  store
import userReducer from './user/user.reducer'
import cartReducer from './cart/cart.reducer'
const persistConfig={//defines config for the store in storage
    key:'root',
    storage,
    whiteList:['cart']//name of reducers we want to have in persistence we didnt include user since its handeled by firebase
}
const rootReducer=combineReducers({
    user:userReducer,
    cart:cartReducer
})

export default combineReducers({
    user:userReducer,
    cart:cartReducer
})
